titles.title: A resolution honoring the career of Major General Richard C. Nash and recognizing his service to the United States and the State of Minnesota.
A resolution honoring the career of Major General Richard C. Nash and recognizing his service to the United States and the State of Minnesota.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Honors the decades of distinguished service of Major General Richard C. Nash, and congratulates him on his retirement following a distinguished 45-year military career.
